checklistDescription: TODO Items for the buddy of a new hire.

readHandbook.description: Get to know your duties as a buddy.

findEmail.description: Onboarding Lead will send new hire’s personal email via Fugacious

introduceYourself.description: Email your new hire with this template.

showUp.description: Show up to work on Monday and Tuesday if your buddy is in the same office as you, or offer to meet over video chat.

greetThem.description: Today will be intense for them, so say hi and offer to answer any questions they have. The time they leave orientation varies based on their location. D.C. gets out around 12PM ET; NY 9AM ET; Chicago 3:30 PM CT; and SF 9AM PT.

allHands.description: Help your buddy attend the all hands meeting on Tuesday.  Leah Gitter will add the new hire to the calendar invite.

addToLists.description: Add your buddy to location-based mailing lists and calendars.

officeTour.description:
